entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is the one who roared 'Who's in charge here?' and is in charge of the group. He is described as covering his moment of inadequacy.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned by Greyback as being worth 200,000 Galleons due to him plus his wand.

entities.name: scabior
entities.description: Scabior is the one who says 'All right! All right, we're in!' and asks Greyback what they should do with the rest of them.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's breathing is described as fast and terrified.

entities.name: mudbloods
entities.description: The prisoners are referred to as 'Mudbloods'.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: Greyback wants the sword if its rubies are worth a small fortune.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: Potter's wand is mentioned as being worth 200,000 Galleons.

relationships.description: Greyback is in charge of Potter.
Scabior asks Greyback for instructions on what to do with the rest of them.
Greyback is in charge of the Mudbloods.
